select a.EQP_SNO as eqpSno , a.EQP_NM as eqpNm , a.SR_NO as srNo , a.EQP_TYP as eqpTyp , CASE a.EQP_TYP WHEN 'C05001' THEN (SELECT CD_NM FROM CODE_DTL WHERE CD = 'C05001')/*데스크탑*/ WHEN 'C05002' THEN (SELECT CD_NM FROM CODE_DTL WHERE CD = 'C05002')/*노트북*/ WHEN 'C05003' THEN (SELECT CD_NM FROM CODE_DTL WHERE CD = 'C05003')/*모니터*/ WHEN 'C05004' THEN (SELECT CD_NM FROM CODE_DTL WHERE CD = 'C05004')/*기타*/ WHEN 'C05005' THEN (SELECT CD_NM FROM CODE_DTL WHERE CD = 'C05005')/*가구*/ WHEN 'C05006' THEN (SELECT CD_NM FROM CODE_DTL WHERE CD = 'C05006')/*프린터*/ END eqpTypNm , a.PURC_DT as purcDt , a.EXPR_DT as exprDt , a.MNFT_CO as mnftCo , a.MDL_NM as mdlNm , a.REMARKS , ( select ta.USER_NM from USER ta, EQP_USER_DTL tb where 1=1 and ta.USER_ID = tb.USER_ID and tb.EQP_SNO = a.EQP_SNO and ta.USE_YN = 'Y' and tb.USE_YN = 'Y' ) as userNm from EQUIPMENT_MGMT a where a.USE_YN = 'Y'
order by a.REG_DT DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}

/* eqpMgmtDAO.queryEqpMgmtUDtl 장비관리 상세 */ select a.EQP_SNO as eqpSno , a.EQP_NM as eqpNm , a.SR_NO as srNo , a.EQP_BUY_DIV as eqpBuyDiv , a.EQP_TYP as eqpTyp , CASE a.EQP_TYP WHEN 'C05001' THEN (SELECT CD_NM FROM CODE_DTL WHERE CD = 'C05001')/*데스크탑*/ WHEN 'C05002' THEN (SELECT CD_NM FROM CODE_DTL WHERE CD = 'C05002')/*노트북*/ WHEN 'C05003' THEN (SELECT CD_NM FROM CODE_DTL WHERE CD = 'C05003')/*모니터*/ WHEN 'C05004' THEN (SELECT CD_NM FROM CODE_DTL WHERE CD = 'C05004')/*기타*/ WHEN 'C05005' THEN (SELECT CD_NM FROM CODE_DTL WHERE CD = 'C05005')/*가구*/ WHEN 'C05006' THEN (SELECT CD_NM FROM CODE_DTL WHERE CD = 'C05006')/*프린터*/ END eqpTypNm , a.PURC_DT as purcDt , a.EXPR_DT as exprDt , a.GUAR_TRM as guarTrm , a.MNFT_CO as mnftCo , a.MDL_NM as mdlNm , a.MNFT_NAT as mnftNat , a.DEPR_PRID as deprPrid , FORMAT(a.UNIT_AMT,0) as unitAmt , a.CPU as cpu , a.RAM as ram , a.HDD_VOL as hddVol , a.SSD_VOL as ssdVol , a.GRAPHICS as graphics , a.MNTR_SIZE as mntrSize , a.MNTR_RES as mntrRes , a.REMARKS as remarks , a.HLD_PLC as hldPlc from EQUIPMENT_MGMT a where a.USE_YN = 'Y' and a.EQP_SNO= #{eqpSno};
mapper.delete: /* delEqpMgmtUDtl 장비 관리 삭제 */ DELETE FROM EQUIPMENT_MGMT WHERE EQP_SNO = #{ eqpSno }

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT A.EQP_SNO) AS TOTCNT FROM EQUIPMENT_MGMT A WHERE 1=1 AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT EUD.EQP_SNO FROM EQP_USER_DTL EUD WHERE EUD.EQP_SNO = A.EQP_SNO AND EUD.PGS_STAT = 'C03001' )
SELECT A.CD_ID, A.CD_ID_NM, B.CD, B.CD_NM FROM CODE A, CODE_DTL B WHERE A.CD_ID = B.CD_ID AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.CD_ID = #{cdId} ORDER BY A.CD_ID ASC, B.SORT_ORD ASC, B.CD ASC
